scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const cwd=process.cwd();const dist=path.join(cwd,'dist');const workspaceDist=path.join(cwd,'backend','dist');const ensure=(p)=>fs.mkdirSync(p,{recursive:true});const copy=(from,to)=>{if(fs.existsSync(from)){ensure(to);for(const entry of fs.readdirSync(from)){fs.cpSync(path.join(from,entry),path.join(to,entry),{recursive:true});}}};ensure(dist);copy(workspaceDist,dist);const parent=path.resolve(cwd,'..');const parentPkg=path.join(parent,'package.json');if(fs.existsSync(parentPkg)){try{const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(parentPkg,'utf8'));const ws=Array.isArray(pkg.workspaces)?pkg.workspaces:[];if(ws.includes('backend')){const parentDist=path.join(parent,'dist');ensure(parentDist);copy(dist,parentDist);copy(workspaceDist,parentDist);}}catch{}}"
